entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain or drizzle changing to periods of freezing drizzle this evening. Fog patches overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to snow mixed with rain near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 near noon then increasing to 40 gusting to 70. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 8.
